content: sewing in the ends be careful not to obscure the 3rd loops of round 3 using yarn c for rounds 1 and 2 make a second heart label them a and b the next two rounds will change a very irregular shape into a neat square they are not difficult and only use simple stitches but require concentration turn off the tv and put the pets and children outside place fresh markers as you go to mark the corners for future rounds there is a chart at the end of the pattern round 4 all worked into 3lo unless otherwise stated this is simply one round of 48 stitches but i have split into sides to make it clearer as each side and corner is different just keep stitching round there is a tick list at the end of the pattern which may be useful if you are struggling to keep your place pick up heart a with yarn d standing half_double_crochet in 3lo of 1st single_crochet after slip_stitch continuing 3lo half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 st half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet in next 2 st place heart b over heart a dtr inserting hook through 3rd loop of marked heart b st and two loops of next heart a st work 2 further dtr in same position pm in centre dtr bulk of first side and first corner formed switch to stitching into 3lo of heart b skip slip_stitch treble_crochet double_crochet in next 2 st half_double_crochet single_crochet in next 4 st 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 2 st pm in 1st of these half_double_crochet second side and second corner formed single_crochet in next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next st heart tip half_double_crochet in next 2 st double_crochet treble_crochet work 3 dtr through 3lo of next st and two top loops of marked heart a st pm in last dtr of group third side and third corner formed switch to stitching in 3lo of heart a treble_crochet in 3lo of same heart a st that has just been worked in double_crochet in next 2 st half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next st
